◆ operator int64_t()

NeoAPI::IntegerFeature::operator int64_t ( ) const

Get the current value of the Feature object as integer.

Valid for the interface types 'IFloat', 'IInteger', 'IEnumeration' and 'IBoolean'

Returns
The current value of the Feature object
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid
See also

virtual NeoString NeoAPI::IntegerFeature::GetUnit ( ) const

◆ GetRepresentation()

virtual NeoString NeoAPI::IntegerFeature::GetRepresentation ( ) const
virtual

Get a value, which recommends the representation type of the Feature object in a GUI.

The presentation is only available for the interface types IFloat and IInteger.

Possible values are:

Linear - IFloat and IInteger
Logarithmic - IFloat and IInteger
PureNumber - IFloat and IInteger
Boolean - IInteger
HexNumber - IInteger
IPV4Address - IInteger
MACAddress - IInteger
Returns
The recommended value for the representation of the Feature object in a GUI
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid

◆ IsSelector()

virtual bool NeoAPI::IntegerFeature::IsSelector ( ) const
virtual

Indicates whether the Feature object is a selector.

A selector is a possibility to define feature dependencies. The current value of a selector Feature has an impact on the value of another Feature object

Returns
True if the Feature object is a selector, otherwise false
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid

◆ GetSelectedFeatureList()

virtual FeatureList& NeoAPI::IntegerFeature::GetSelectedFeatureList ( ) const
virtual

Get a list of features that depend on this selector Feature.

Returns
The list of all features that depend on this selector Feature
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid

◆ GetInterface()

virtual NeoString NeoAPI::BaseFeature::GetInterface ( ) const
virtualinherited

Get the GenICam interface type of the Feature object.

Depending on the GenICam interface type, different feature access methods are provided. The available interface types are defined in header file bgapi2_def.h. See definitions BGAPI2_NODEINTERFACE_xxx

Returns
The interface type of the Feature object
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid

◆ IsAvailable()

virtual bool NeoAPI::BaseFeature::IsAvailable ( ) const
virtualinherited

Indicates whether the Feature object is available.

"Not available" or false is equivalent to the access mode 'NA'

Returns
True if the Feature object is available to work with it, otherwise false
Exceptions
FeatureAccessExceptionThe calling object is not valid
